column3: Latest;Tbong Khmum: A------  young man was kiled in Memot commune
column5: Tbong Khmum province on the evening of February 23
column6: 2020.------The victim went to stop his uncle from arguing with  two mentally ill people who were causing a scene in the village. He was then stabbed with a knife. ------ A woman aged 36 years old and a 43-year-old man were arrested and charged with the murder of Kim Rithy. Chhay
column8: who died in hospital of his wounds. ------AREY
